com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions

Interface ISCUILocalizationProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCUILocalizationProvider

    public interface ISCUILocalizationProvider
    A provider interface for localization at server.
    Before making a call for localization Application will have to register an implementation of ISCUILocalizationProvider with the framework.
    Optionally Application will need to call #registerBundle(String) to register the bundle they are going to use. For any localization request
    application will have to go through SCUILocalizationHelper.

    Plugging in an Implementation.
    • Making the below web.xml context parameter entry 
              <context-param>
                <param-name>scui-localization-provider</param-name>
                <param-value>Fully qualified class name of the implementation</param-value>
        </context-param>
    • Calling the SCUILocalizationHelper#setLocalizationProvider(SCUIContext, ISCUILocalizationProvider)
    hyadav

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getBundleFor(java.lang.String name)
      Since every form on the ui will have a specific bundle file.
      java.lang.String getDBString(SCUIContext uiContext, java.lang.String message)
      This method will retun the localized string based on the locale from the database.
      java.lang.String getString(SCUIContext uiContext, java.lang.String message)
      This method will be used to fetch the localized string based on the locale from the bundles registered by application(Registering bundle is left as an option to Application).
      void init()
      init method will be used to perform any intialization if required.
      void registerBundle(java.lang.String bundleName)
      This method will be used to register the bundle with the framework.

        void init()
        init method will be used to perform any intialization if required.

      • getString

        java.lang.String getString(SCUIContext uiContext,
                           java.lang.String message)
        This method will be used to fetch the localized string based on the locale from the bundles registered by application(Registering bundle is left as an option to Application). uiContext message localizedString for the given message

      • getDBString

        java.lang.String getDBString(SCUIContext uiContext,
                             java.lang.String message)
        This method will retun the localized string based on the locale from the database. uiContext message localizedString for the given message

      • getBundleFor

        java.lang.String getBundleFor(java.lang.String name)
        Since every form on the ui will have a specific bundle file. This method will return the bundle name for the a given form. name bundleName for the given form name

      • registerBundle

        void registerBundle(java.lang.String bundleName)
        This method will be used to register the bundle with the framework. The registered bundle will be used to localize by #getString(SCUIContext, String) or #getDBString(SCUIContext, String) bundleName
